Position: Part-Time Teaching Positions – 2026 (PE/Health, Literacy, and Mathematics)
Description: Start: Term 1, Week 4 - 16/02/2026 Finish: Term 4, Week 7 - 26/11/2026 Hours: 14 hours per week (Monday – Thursday) At Ilminster Intermediate , we pride ourselves on being “Simply the Best” — a place where our values of being Positive, Safe, Inclusive, Responsible, and Respectful guide everything we do. We are seeking four passionate and motivated teachers to join our team in 2026. These part-time positions (14 hours per week) will each focus on one curriculum area — PE/Health, Literacy, or Mathematics — giving you the opportunity to specialise, deepen your expertise, and teach in the area you love most. Ilminster operates an innovative, high school–style timetable where students move between classes for core learning areas. This approach allows teachers to concentrate on one curriculum strength, while still being part of a highly collaborative and supportive team. Do you have a talent and passion for working with students who have a diverse and complex range of specialist learning and care needs? If so, we want to hear from you! Kōwhai Specialist School, based in Hastings, is looking for Teacher Aides who have great initiative, strong work ethic, lots of energy, show kindness, have a great sense of humour, and have an uplifting personality. You must have proven ability to work effectively and professionally within a team and be prepared to positively support learning and well-being for our precious ākonga. You will also need to be enthusiastic about growing your own capabilities and be open to receiving constructive feedback to support our ākonga and the direction of our kura. Teacher Aide positions are 28.75 hours a week and term-time only. Conditions of employment are covered by the Support Staff in Schools Collective Agreement (available online). Mount Roskill Grammar School is a large, co-educational secondary school in Auckland. We are proud of our diversity, academic excellence and our values in action - manaakitanga, whanaungatanga and tūmanakotanga. We are currently looking for a Teacher Aide to join our MacLean Centre (for students living with a disability). The successful applicant will have strong interpersonal skills and be passionate about supporting the learning of teenage students with special needs. You will work as part of a team and be committed to learn and apply specialised teaching approaches. This role may require Tiaki duties. This position is a fixed term position to cover two terms of maternity leave. The role is 5 days per week, working 32 hours per week, term time only.   We are employing now for the start of the 2026 school year, starting 27 January 2026. Newlands Intermediate School Teaching Assistants / Kaiāwhina - Fixed Term / 27.5 Hours Newlands Intermediate School  is a coeducational, state school in Te Whanganui a Tara, Wellington that upholds the values of Whanaungatanga, Ako, Rangatahi and Kaitiaki. As a kura we are committed to Te Tiriti o Waitangi, in forming partnerships, curriculum, pedagogy, and processes to reflect our wonderful community. We are looking for an enthusiastic and skilled Teaching Assistant / Kaiāwhina to join our learning support team. This is a wonderful opportunity for a dedicated practitioner with a genuine passion for inclusive education. You will be joining a very supportive and collaborative staff, working alongside kaiako (teachers) to support our rangatahi (students) across year 7 and 8. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of, and commitment to, inclusive practices, helping us ensure every student has the opportunity to thrive.
